calendar.p: The Julian calendar, as used in England before 1752. The year starts on March 25.

A Hebrew calendar dating from the creation of the world, based on biblical genealogy. The start date varies according to the biblical texts used. Here, based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 3962 BC.
A calendar dating from the Roman discovery of Britain. Based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 50 BC.

body.ab:
All viscountes yonger sonnes be borne Baronnetes
& shall weare as many pawlderinges as
Baronettes but shall goe belowe them.
Baron. A Baron may have his gowne borne vp
by a man in a Viscountes presence & the
Couer of his cupp helde vnder whilesthe
Drinketh. His eldest sonne shall goeas a
a Banneret & have the vpper hande of
a Banneret Because his father is a Peere of the Realme.
This daughter shall goe aboue all Bannerettes
wyves & knightes wyves. Except she doe
marry with one vnder degree of a
knighte.
knight A knightes wyfe may have her kyrtle
borne vp except in her betters
presence And her foot sheete in like
sorte.
And if any of the Bloode Royall stande
in place they must stand above all
of that degree they be of themselues./
flourish
Nomber of mowrners
for euery estate.
A kinge hathe — xven
A Queene — xiii
A Prynce — xiii.
A Marquise — xi.
An Earle — x.
A Viscounte —
{ A Baron. —
{ A knight — v.
Mr Morganes booke
of the Temple (a Norhamptonshire man)
Anno. 13: Henrici:8.
Dux: Buckingham condemnatur coram Thomas: duce Norffolk: eo tempore Senescall
Anglia iudicio parium suorum scilicet vnius ducis. vnius marchionis .7. Comitum
et .12. Baronum.
Die veneris :17: maii Edwardus: dux Buckingham: decollatus est super montem iuxta
Turrim London. sepultus in ecclesia ordinis Sancti Augustini
Anno .15 :Henrici: 8: 27: Aprilis: tempore parliamenti Arthurus Plantagenet miles filius
nothus Regis Edwardi:4: apud fontem Brigidia. creatur vicecomes de Insula
iure vxoris relicte. Edmondi: Dudley decollati.
Anno .7 :Henrici: 8: Margareta Regina Scotie nupta est Archibaldo Dowglas
Comiti de Angois sine assensa Regis ffratris sui, & aufugerunt in Angliam
& in Castro Harbothell in Comitatu Northumbrensi: nata est margareta filia
eorum.
Anno:1248. 31:Henrici:3: Thomas de Bellocampo Comes Nor...
Norwici: et Mariscallus Angliae .24. die Augusti .1354. 28
Edwardi: 3: ... vnus inter caeteros nobiles qui scripserunt ad papam
circa negotia ffranciae./ Math. Paris. fol. 1004
Carta: Anno: 12: Henrici: 3:
Rogerus de Dantes: vel Antes & matildis Comitissa Hereffordensis
vxor eius† soror Willelmi: Comes de mandevill nuper
Comitis Essexensis./ † De Dauntesia ./
anno .12. henrici: 8. Comes Kyldare deputatus terrae Hiberniae exoneratur ab officio, & Thomas
Comes Surreggia eius loco constituitur Deputatus eiusdem terre
procurante Wolseo Cardinali, qui in initio Aprilis iter arripuit
versus Hiberniam.
